entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
